title: Thunderbird update 115.3.1 self installed now nothing works
content: Thunderbird update 115.3.1 self installed now nothing works. When I first opened program after update and tried to retrieve mail for one account (of5) got a window telling me password not accepted by pop server (at zoho.com) and asking if i wished to enter a new one. Said no and went to passwords in config to check if they had transferred properly. They had. Tried again to download messages with same results (password not accepted)and clicked to enter new one. Instead window popped up for next account telling me password not accepted by server and did I want to enter a new one. Same results for every account in order without ever letting me access one. Rebooted - no change. Downloaded copy from mozilla and re-installed thinking it may reconfigure what was wrong. No luck. Now when I try to retrieve messages I don't even get password not accepted only "done" in bottom left corner where it usually shows download happening. I have used Thunderbird practically since it came out and have installed configured and transferred accounts across many computers and never had any problem like this!
creator: divideweb

title: emails automatically being deleted
content:
Emails that I receive in Mail for Windows, when deleted, also delete the same email from Thunderbird, but not the other way around.

How do I stop this and recover those lost emails?
creator: thewainwrights

title: Thunderbird E-mail cannot connect to outlook.com account
content:
ERROR From Microsoft. Account is at outlook.com. Using Firefox browser. Standard Security setting.

We can't sign you in Your browser is currently set to block cookies. You need to allow cookies to use this service.

Just started this evening. Just got upgraded to Thunderbird version 115.3.1 on one machine. Second machine still running version 105.13.0 with no issues. Both machines are Windows 11 Home Ver 22H2
creator: FDReynolds
